website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic LightStream PJD5255L is a modestly priced DLP data projector with a sparse port selection, but it has good brightness and solid data-image quality.
cons: Audio is on the soft side

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Movie Projector
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this because I could get NO help from View Sonic!!! The sound is ok inside, but horrible outside and I could get NO help as to what speakers to buy or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great visuals and easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector to use with my Mac and Apple TV at school as it has the hdmi connector. I wish the volume was louder and have tried to connect speakers but doesn't really work. The sound cuts out with my Apple TV but with the Mac, it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Connect.

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Wis it had more input options
customer_reviews.text: Use this for movie night outside. Works good. Wis it had more input options.
customer_reviews.author: Merkas

customer_reviews.title: Love my view sonic projector
customer_reviews.text: Love my view sonic projector. I use it as my main television. You have a clear picture whether in the dark or with plenty of daylight or lights. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Crisp, bright projection in large ball room. No need to dim lights. One of the lightest projectors.
customer_reviews.author: Satish Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic projector. Really bright. I have two of these now and love them both.
customer_reviews.author: dep

customer_reviews.title: quiet, quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 years, still works well and is quiet
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, lightweight, easy to use and very bright picture. Commercial quality!
customer_reviews.author: J. Thillmann

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck! Much clearer picture quality than ...
customer_reviews.text: Bang for the Buck! Much clearer picture quality than I imagined. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for the price, easy to use and set up out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but does not have audio out. Makes it difficult to use chromecast with a sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold

customer_reviews.title: Great image for the price
customer_reviews.text: I returned the I RULU projector and got this one instead. I believe this is the cheapest XVGA projector you can get. I've only used it to project from a computer (PowerPoint) and the image was very sharp and bright. At the bottom end of price there are some shortcomings--you can't project directly from a USB stick and the zoom is very minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: No way to hook up sound directly.
customer_reviews.text: This review would have had 4-5 stars for quality of picture, quiet operation, but I'm disappointed that it is going to be difficult and costly just to get a speaker/sound system set up because the model we got (yes, this expensive one) lacks a simple jack/connection to hook up a speaker/system to. The sound it plays is not very loud on its own. I cannot believe for the price the manufacturer failed to include this one tiny detail. We showed pictures of all the hook-ups to a tech guy and there is nothing compatible without purchasing expensive conversion pieces or more expensive sound system. I wonder if a speaker out there would plug into the mini USB?
customer_reviews.author: Momofmanylittleones

customer_reviews.title: " This project is super sharp even in the backyard before total sunset
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for outdoor movie nights and for use in a windowless basement. Couldn't be more thrilled with this product. Our old projector (10+years old) required complete darkness and the picture was a bit "soft." This project is super sharp even in the backyard before total sunset. In fact the picture was just as good outside about 15 minutes before sunset as it was in the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal

customer_reviews.title: No horizontal keystone.  Digital vertical keystone only.
customer_reviews.text: The image is quite good, but you need to have the "right" alignment and distance from your screen, or your picture will be out of shape. This projector requires perfect horizontal alignment in order to get a rectangular image. The digital keystone can only adjust a vertical misalignment.
customer_reviews.author: eco_prof

customer_reviews.title: Beware: No external sound with HDMI
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, BUT: I bought this to use with our AppleTV. That worked fine, but because of the design, you can't have external sound with the HDMI cable plugged in (per customer service). There isn't an audio out jack on this unit. So, we had a bunch of girls over to watch movies in the backyard, and they could see a great picture but they couldn't hear anything because the only sound was from the unit. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mpj

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for a church in Antigua. During ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a church in Antigua. During the 2nd use, it made a POP and quit working altogether. No power to any thing.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Friend

customer_reviews.title: Not as portable as we thought it would be...
customer_reviews.text: Weight is posted incorrectly. The items net weight is 2.4kg - which is 5.3lbs - not 2.4lbs which is posted in the specifications. Gross weight is 3.8kg (8.4lbs). We purchased this over a significantly cheaper projector purely based on the fact that we thought it was half the weight of the other, but it's actually heavier. It also has no port for USB or memory card slot, so it must be connected to a computer, tv, etc. which is not the kind of portability we were looking for. That was our fault though for not seeing that it didn't come with one of those ports.
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: 1. Can someone tell me if it makes alot ...
customer_reviews.text: 1.Can someone tell me if it makes alot of noise when in use? 2.didnt see in the product review the resolution. Is it a 720p or 1080p
customer_reviews.author: jeffery duhaney

product_meta.title: ViewSonic PJD5255L LightStream XGA Home Entertainment Projector HDMI
product_meta.description: The View Sonic Light Stream PJD5255L price-performance projector features 3200 lumens, native XGA 1024x768 resolution, user-friendly design, and a sleek white chassis. Exclusive Super Color technology offers a wider color range for true-to-life image projection, while sound enhancement technology delivers improved sound quality. The PJD5255L also features HDMI and VGA connectivity, and a RS232 control port. An energy-saving Dynamic Eco feature reduces power consumption by up to 70%, and extends the lamp life by up to 10,000 hours. With advanced audiovisual features, flexible connectivity options, and an affordable price, the PJD5255L is ideal for use in education and small business environments.
feature_bullets: Super Color technology delivers superior, richer, true-to-life colors; Up to 3200 ANSI lumen brightness and 10,000:1 contrast ratio
3D Blu-ray ready HDMI input; Choice of 5 view settings for a variety of usage scenarios
Sonic Expert technology delivers enhanced sound with enlarged speaker chamber and a powerful amplifier
Intuitive interface includes tactile keypad, top lamp door, and optional cable management system
Industry-leading warranty: 3-years limited on parts and labor, 1 year on lamp, and free 1st year Express Exchange

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars36 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
